content: blue streak by wendy chapman a truly fast project blue streak will literally fly off your needles easily finished in a day this makes for a great last minute gift sure to please what color will you streak materials abbreviations 1 skein berroco vintage chunky co cast on 50% acrylic 40% wool 10% nylon sts stitches polyamide 130yd/119m to 100g/3 5oz p purl k knit us size 11 8 00 mm 24 circular needle sl slip one stitch purlwise or size needed to obtain gauge repeat repeat stitch marker tapestry needle bobble bind off gauge 13 sts and 15 row = 4in/10cm in stockinette stitch blue streak continued pattern directions co 78 sts place marker and join to work in the round being careful not to twist your stitches round 1 *k1 p1 k1 p3 repeat from * to end work round 1 5 times round 7 k all round 8 *p1 sl 1 repeat from * to end round 9 k all round 10 *sl 1 p1 repeat from * to end work rounds 7-10 9 times or until piece measures 7in/18cm last round *p3 k1 p1 k1 repeat from * to end work last round 7 times bobble all stitches in rib pattern weave in ends block lightly and enjoy bluedogworkshop etsy com www bluedogworkshop com copyright 2013 wendy chapman wendy@bluedogworkshop com pattern for personal use only please do not sell finished items from this pattern without permission thank you
